target.name: help
target.description: Prints POI's Ant usage help
target.echo: - Execute "ant -projecthelp" to view a listing of the main build targets. - Execute "ant help-properties" to view a listing of some properties controlling the build process.

target.name: help-properties
target.description: Prints a listing of build controlling properties
target.echo:
The following properties control the build process:
-Ddisconnected="true": Do not execute any targets that require an online connection to the Internet. -Dtestcase=org.apache.poi.xxx.xxx : for the single-test target, specify the test to run -Dfilename=xxxx.xls : for the command line task targets, specify the file to run against
WARNING: This list is not exhaustive.
